# CollisionEvents.Ended

**Structure**

An event raised when two objects, previously in contact, separate.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Ended
```

## Getting the involved entities

- **entityA**: The first entity involved in the collision.
- **entityB**: The second entity involved in the collision.

## Detecting collisions

- **CollisionEvents.Began**: An event raised when two objects collide.
- **CollisionEvents.Updated**: An event raised on every frame when two objects are in contact.

## Conforms To

- Event
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: The first entity involved in the collision.
items.name: entityA

items.description: The second entity involved in the collision.
items.name: entityB
